pages.text: Some changes in the general game. You don't have all the stuff in JEI showing. You need to unlock most of the stuff. $(br) You can follow the advancements screen ($(l)$(k:advancements)$()) to see excactly what you would need to be doing. $(br) As you progress, this book changes and new information appears in it.

Also, most items now have weight. And there is a weight limit that you can see to the right of your hotbar. If you go over that limit, you slow down.$(br) This is to encourage transportation infrastructure. You will have plenty of ways to transport massive amounts of stuff quickly.
